title: Undo the last change that caused deployment failure and redeploy

requirements.text: Undo (revert) the most recent product/code change that triggered the current deployment error, then redeploy the application so the live Preview loads successfully without deployment errors.

quotes: undo the action and redeploy it

acceptanceCriteria: Deployment completes successfully with no build/deploy errors.
The Valentine proposal flow is navigable through all 5 steps end-to-end.
The final step heading renders and reads exactly "So Shruti ❤️....".
No console errors or warnings are present in the Preview during normal interaction.

constraints: Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only add migration.mo if state schema changes require it.

Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui).
All user-facing text must be in English.
nonGoals: Adding new features or changing the Valentine proposal content beyond what is necessary to revert the breaking change and restore successful deployment.
Introducing new backend persistence or external services/integrations.
